nodes.text: Wookiee flu was an illness that caused the individual to experience vomiting and increased mucus production at a level compared to the Wookiee species. When Chelli Lona Aphra's lover Yoshi became sick with it soon after their first encounter, Aphra found the symptoms too disgusting to be around Yoshi. She later advised her new lover, Sana Starros, to avoid picturing it.
